dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4421 IH: Better Straws Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Tenney introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14208 relating to ending procurement and forced use of paper straws.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Better Straws Act.
Executive Order 14208 (90 Fed. Reg. 9585; relating to ending procurement and forced use of paper straws) shall have the force and effect of law.
